description: Schema for order tipping and post-delivery ratings (dev.ocs.order.tipping_and_ratings@1.0)

tip.description: Tip amount included in the order.

food.description: Rating for the food quality (1-5 stars).

delivery.description: Rating for the delivery service (1-5 stars).

restaurant.description: Overall rating for the restaurant (1-5 stars).

comment.description: Optional text comment from the customer.

ratings.description: Ratings provided by the customer after the order is completed.
